solution_line_template: If she sent {applications_in_state} job applications to her state, she sent {applications_in_state}*{multiplier_other_states} = <<{applications_in_state}*{multiplier_other_states}={applications_other_states}>>{applications_other_states} job applications to other states.

The total number of job applications she has sent is {applications_other_states}+{applications_in_state} = <<{applications_other_states}+{applications_in_state}={total_applications}>>{total_applications}
